de.must.middle
Interface Controllable

All Known Subinterfaces:
ProportionalListReport
All Known Implementing Classes:
CumulationReport, FileOutputThread, GenericInterruptibleThread, InterruptibleBatchThread, ProportionalListReportByHtml, ProportionalListReportDirectly, ProportionalListReportDirectly, ReportPresentationTask, TableToHTML
public interface Controllable

Interface between independent threads and their user interface(s) to start and cancel them (while running).

See Also:
ThreadController

Method Detail

setThreadController

void setThreadController(ThreadController threadController)
Set the thread controller.

Parameters:
threadController - the thread controller to use.

addThreadDoneListener

void addThreadDoneListener(ThreadDoneListener l)
Adds the specified ThreadDoneListener to receive thread done events.

See Also:
ThreadDoneEvent

start

void start()
Causes this thread to begin execution; the Java Virtual Machine calls the run method of this thread.

The result is that two threads are running concurrently: the current thread (which returns from the call to the start method) and the other thread (which executes its run method).

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalThreadStateException - if the thread was already started.
See Also:
Thread.run()
